20110113141418.333|20110113141421.667|TR0|
20110113141421.667|20110113141425.000|TR0|Some scan the headlines. Others
20110113141425.000|20110113141428.333|TR0|go straight to the sports
20110113141428.333|20110113141431.667|TR0|section. And then there are
20110113141431.667|20110113141435.000|TR0|those who are simply interested
20110113141435.000|20110113141438.333|TR0|in these: So you open a
20110113141438.333|20110113141441.667|TR0|newspaper in public and it may

20110113141450.000|20110113141452.500|TR0|developments. But you may very

20110113141458.333|20110113141501.667|TR0|Spanish society. [DUB: ISABEL
20110113141501.667|20110113141505.000|TR0|MARTINEZ LOZANO, General
20110113141505.000|20110113141508.333|TR0|Secretary, Ministry of Equality]
20110113141508.333|20110113141511.667|TR0|In most cases, these classified
20110113141511.667|20110113141515.000|TR0|ads serve as a cover-up for the
20110113141515.000|20110113141518.333|TR0|work of crime groups. The
20110113141518.333|20110113141521.667|TR0|prostitution mafia to be

20110113141535.000|20110113141537.500|TR0|to respond to these ads. If the

20110113141548.333|20110113141551.667|TR0|not hurt the vice mafia - but
